email_sequence.subject: Why your $16M demand charges spike from 15-minute peaks
email_sequence.body:
Most facilities managers don't realize they're paying two separate utility charges:

• Energy charges (kWh): What you consume
• Demand charges (kW): Your highest 15-minute peak each month

At Foxwoods, demand charges likely represent $16.2M of your annual energy spend - roughly 90% of your total bill.

Here's the problem: One spike during a busy weekend sets your rate for the entire month. Your gaming floor creates these spikes through harmonic distortion - invisible electrical waste that inflates your apparent power draw beyond what you actually need.
email_sequence.cta: Download your estimated demand charge breakdown

email_sequence.subject: Gaming equipment creates 15-25% harmonic distortion
email_sequence.body:
Your slot machines and HVAC variable frequency drives create 15-25% current harmonic distortion. For context, office buildings typically see 5-8%.

This distortion inflates your apparent power (kVA), forcing you to draw more current than needed. Your utility meter reads this as higher kW demand - even when your actual power needs haven't changed.

This is why building management systems and LED upgrades barely move the needle on casino utility bills. They reduce energy consumption (kWh) but don't address the harmonic distortion driving your demand charges (kW).
email_sequence.cta: See your estimated harmonic distortion profile

email_sequence.subject: How solid-state filtration works at the electrical panel
email_sequence.body:
Tune filters install at your electrical panels and eliminate harmonics in real-time using solid-state technology. No moving parts, no maintenance, 20+ year lifespan.

The result: Cleaner power flow reduces apparent power demand without changing your actual operations. Your gaming floor runs exactly the same - you just draw less current to do it.

Unlike building management systems that require behavioral changes, this works automatically 24/7. Zero downtime installation, zero operational disruption.
email_sequence.cta: Send technical specifications to your engineering team

email_sequence.body:
Your slot machines and VFDs are creating 15-25% current harmonic distortion. Office buildings typically see 5-8%.

This distortion inflates apparent power (kVA), which increases current draw, which spikes your kW demand readings. It's invisible on your energy management system but shows up as higher demand charges every month.

This is the root cause that standard energy solutions can't address. You can optimize HVAC and upgrade to LEDs all day - but if you're not cleaning up the harmonics at the electrical panel, you're missing the biggest opportunity.

It's like treating symptoms while ignoring the disease.
email_sequence.cta: See your estimated harmonic distortion profile

email_sequence.subject: How solid-state filtration works (zero downtime)
email_sequence.body:
The Tune system installs at your electrical panels and eliminates harmonic distortion in real-time. Think of it as noise-canceling headphones for your electrical system.

Key operational benefits:
• Zero downtime installation
• No ongoing maintenance
• 20+ year equipment life
• Extends life of existing equipment

Unlike building management systems that try to reduce usage, this cleans the power you're already using. Cleaner power = lower apparent power = reduced demand charges.

It works when traditional energy solutions don't because it addresses the physics, not just the behavior.
email_sequence.cta: Send technical specifications to your engineering team

email_sequence.subject: 30-day metered pilot (same as Vegas casino)
email_sequence.body:
Same approach we used for the Vegas casino verification:

• 30-day metered pilot on representative electrical panels
• Pre-defined success criteria (8%+ kW reduction)
• Third-party verification of results
• No upfront cost for pilot

Typical outcomes: 14-month payback, 25-40% IRR on full deployment.

If the pilot doesn't hit the numbers, we remove the equipment at no cost. If it does, you'll have verified data to make the business case.

Low risk, high potential return. Same process that generated $6.8M in annual savings for the Vegas property.
email_sequence.cta: Review pilot agreement terms
